attributes.action: A PETITION FOR DONALD TRUMP TO BE ALLOWED INTO THE UK FOR A STATE VISIT
attributes.additional_details: WE NEED THE LIKES OF DONALD TRUMP, WE NEED TO KEEP OUR COUNTRIES SAFE, WE NEED TO CLOSE OUR BORDERS ON TERRORISM. CORRUPTION IS RIPE & HE WILL DRAIN THE SWAMPS. FROM THE GOVERNMENT DOWN.
attributes.background: AS THE PRESIDENT OF THE USA DONALD TRUMP IS ENTITLED TO A STATE VISIT TO THE UK. THE SAME AS ALL PREVIOUS PRESIDENTS BEFORE HIM
